title: The Affair-Quandary
brief_description: A woman is in a quandary about whether to confront her husband with her suspicions that he is having an affair. Her husband’s quandary is whether to tell his wife, leave his wife or break off the affair. This program will interest people in relationships, educators, counsellors, community health and women’s organisations and marriage counselling services.
